Usage¶

Command Line Usage¶

DateTools CLI Utility.

usage: datetools [-h] {apply} ...

subcommands¶

For more details of each subcommand, add it as an argument followed by –help.

subcommand

Possible choices: apply

Sub-commands¶

apply¶

Date calculation tools

datetools apply [-h] [-d DATE] [-t TARGET] [-w WEEK] [-a ADD]
Named Arguments¶
-d, --date

Base date

-t, --target

Target date

-w, --week

Weeks to add

Default: 0

-a, --add

Days to add

Default: 0

Project name not set
